catalog.name: agent.define
catalog.description: Validates and registers agent manifests for the Betty Framework. Ensures schema compliance, validates skill references, and updates the Agent Registry.
usage_examples: Register new agent in the framework

entrypoints.description: Validate an agent manifest and register it in the Agent Registry.

parameters.name: manifest_path
parameters.description: Path to the agent.yaml file to validate

inputs.name: manifest_path
inputs.description: Path to the agent.yaml file to validate

outputs.name: validation_result
outputs.description: Validation results including errors and warnings

catalog.name: agent.run
catalog.description: Execute a registered Betty agent by loading its manifest, generating a Claude-friendly prompt, invoking skills based on the agent's workflow, and logging results. Supports both iterative and oneshot reasoning modes with optional Claude API integration.

entrypoints.description: Execute a Betty agent with optional task context. Generates Claude-friendly prompts, invokes the Claude API (or simulates), executes planned skills, and logs all results to agent_logs/ directory.

parameters.name: agent_path
parameters.description: Path to agent.yaml file or agent name (e.g., api.designer)

parameters.name: task_context
parameters.description: Optional task or query for the agent to execute

inputs.name: agent_path
inputs.description: Path to agent manifest (agent.yaml) or agent name (e.g., api.designer)

inputs.name: task_context
inputs.description: Task or query to provide to the agent for execution

inputs.name: save_log
inputs.description: Whether to save execution log to agent_logs/<agent>.json

outputs.name: execution_result
outputs.description: Complete execution results including prompt, Claude response, and skill outputs

catalog.name: api.compatibility
catalog.description: Detect breaking changes between API specification versions
usage_examples: Check for breaking changes: /skill/api/compatibility --old_spec_path v1.yaml --new_spec_path v2.yaml
Analyze API evolution: /skill/api/compatibility --old_spec_path old.yaml --new_spec_path new.yaml --fail_on_breaking false

inputs.name: old_spec_path
inputs.description: Path to the old/previous API specification

inputs.name: new_spec_path
inputs.description: Path to the new/current API specification

inputs.name: fail_on_breaking
inputs.description: Exit with error code if breaking changes detected

outputs.name: compatible
outputs.description: Whether the new spec is backward compatible

catalog.name: api.define
catalog.description: Create OpenAPI and AsyncAPI specifications from templates

inputs.name: service_name
inputs.description: Name of the service/API (e.g., user-service, order-api)

inputs.name: spec_type
inputs.description: Type of specification (openapi or asyncapi)

inputs.name: template
inputs.description: Template to use (zalando, basic, minimal)

inputs.name: output_dir
inputs.description: Output directory for generated specification

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: API version

catalog.name: api.generate-models
catalog.description: Generate type-safe models from OpenAPI and AsyncAPI specifications using Modelina
usage_examples: Generate Python models: /skill/api/generate-models --spec_path api.yaml --language python --output_dir src/models

inputs.name: spec_path
inputs.description: Path to API specification file (OpenAPI or AsyncAPI)

inputs.name: language
inputs.description: Target language (typescript, python, java, go, csharp)

inputs.name: output_dir
inputs.description: Output directory for generated models

inputs.name: package_name
inputs.description: Package/module name for generated code

outputs.name: models_path
outputs.description: Path to directory containing generated models

catalog.name: api.validate
catalog.description: Validate OpenAPI and AsyncAPI specifications against enterprise guidelines
usage_examples: Check against Zalando guidelines: /skill/api/validate --spec_path api.yaml --guideline_set zalando

inputs.name: spec_path
inputs.description: Path to the API specification file (OpenAPI or AsyncAPI)

inputs.name: guideline_set
inputs.description: Which API guidelines to validate against (zalando, google, microsoft)

inputs.name: strict
inputs.description: Enable strict mode (warnings become errors)

outputs.name: validation_report
outputs.description: Detailed validation results including errors and warnings

outputs.name: guideline_version
outputs.description: Version of guidelines used for validation

catalog.name: command.define
catalog.description: Validate and register command manifests in the Command Registry
usage_examples: Add new CLI command to Betty

inputs.name: manifest_path
inputs.description: Path to the command manifest file (YAML)

catalog.name: docs.sync.readme
catalog.description: Regenerate the top-level README.md to reflect all current registered skills and agents. Pulls from registry/skills.json and registry/agents.json, groups by category, and updates documentation sections while maintaining repo style and tone.

entrypoints.description: Sync README.md with current registry state. Updates skills tables, agents links, and documentation map to reflect all registered skills and agents.

catalog.name: generate.marketplace
catalog.description: Generate marketplace catalog files from Betty Framework registries. Filters active and certified skills/agents and outputs marketplace-ready JSON files.

entrypoints.description: Generate marketplace catalogs from registry files. Filters by status: active and certified: true.

catalog.name: hook.define
catalog.description: Create and register validation hooks for Claude Code
usage_examples: Set up pre-commit API validation hook

inputs.name: event
inputs.description: Hook event trigger (on_file_edit, on_file_save, on_commit, on_push, on_tool_use)

inputs.name: pattern
inputs.description: File pattern to match (e.g., "*.openapi.yaml", "specs/**/*.yaml")

inputs.name: command
inputs.description: Command to execute when hook triggers (skill name or full command)

inputs.name: blocking
inputs.description: Whether hook should block operation if it fails

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.description: Timeout in milliseconds (default 30 seconds)

inputs.name: description
inputs.description: Human-readable description of what the hook does

catalog.name: hook.register
catalog.description: Validate and register hook manifests in the Hook Registry

inputs.name: manifest_path
inputs.description: Path to the hook manifest file (YAML)

catalog.name: plugin.build
catalog.description: Automatically bundle a plugin directory (or the whole repo) into a deployable Claude Code plugin package. Gathers all declared entrypoints, validates handler files exist, and packages everything into .tar.gz or .zip under /dist.

entrypoints.description: Bundle plugin directory into deployable package. Validates all entrypoints and handlers before packaging.

parameters.name: output_format
parameters.description: Package format (tar.gz or zip, defaults to tar.gz)

inputs.name: plugin_path
inputs.description: Path to plugin.yaml (defaults to ./plugin.yaml)

inputs.name: output_format
inputs.description: Package format (tar.gz or zip, defaults to tar.gz)

inputs.name: output_dir
inputs.description: Output directory (defaults to ./dist)

outputs.name: build_report
outputs.description: JSON report with validated entrypoints, missing files, and package checksum

catalog.name: plugin.sync
catalog.description: Automatically generates plugin.yaml from Betty Framework registries. Reads skills.json, commands.json, and hooks.json to build a complete plugin configuration.

entrypoints.description: Generate plugin.yaml from registry files. Syncs active skills with entrypoints into plugin commands.

catalog.name: policy.enforce
catalog.description: Validates operations against organizational policies before execution
usage_examples: Validate against organizational policy: skill executes policy.enforce before operation
Enforce compliance rules on API changes

catalog.name: registry.update
catalog.description: Updates the Betty Framework Skill Registry by adding or modifying entries based on validated skill manifests.
usage_examples: Update existing skill entry in registry

entrypoints.description: Add or update entries in the Skill Registry.

parameters.name: manifest_path
parameters.description: Path to the skill manifest (.skill.yaml) being added or updated.

catalog.name: run.agent
catalog.description: Simulates execution of a Betty agent by loading its manifest, constructing the prompt, and demonstrating which skills would be invoked. Useful for testing agent design and understanding agent behavior.

entrypoints.description: Simulate execution of an agent manifest. Shows the constructed prompt, mock Claude response, and skills that would be invoked.

parameters.name: agent_path
parameters.description: Path to agent.yaml file or agent name (e.g., api.designer)

parameters.name: input_text
parameters.description: Optional input text to provide to the agent

inputs.name: agent_path
inputs.description: Path to agent manifest (agent.yaml) or agent name

inputs.name: input_text
inputs.description: Optional task/query to provide to the agent

outputs.name: execution_log
outputs.description: Details of the simulated agent execution including prompt and skills

catalog.name: skill.create
catalog.description: Generates a new Betty Framework Skill directory and manifest. Used to bootstrap new Claude Code-compatible skills inside the Betty Framework.
usage_examples: Scaffold new skill: /skill/create --skill_name my.skill --description 'My new skill'

entrypoints.description: Scaffolds a new Betty Skill directory, generates its manifest, validates it with skill.define, and updates the registry.

parameters.name: skill_name
parameters.description: Name of the new skill (e.g., runtime.execute)

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of what the skill will do

catalog.name: skill.define
catalog.description: Validates and registers skill manifests (.skill.yaml) for the Betty Framework. Ensures schema compliance and updates the Skill Registry.
usage_examples: Validate a new skill manifest: /skill/define manifest.skill.yaml

entrypoints.description: Validate a Claude Code skill manifest and register it in the Betty Skill Registry.

parameters.name: manifest_path
parameters.description: Path to the skill.yaml file to validate.

catalog.name: workflow.compose
catalog.description: Executes multi-step Betty Framework workflows by chaining existing skills. Enables declarative orchestration of skill pipelines.

entrypoints.description: Execute a Betty workflow defined in a YAML file.

parameters.name: workflow_path
parameters.description: Path to a workflow YAML file to execute.

catalog.name: workflow.validate
catalog.description: Validates Betty workflow YAML definitions to ensure correct structure and required fields.

entrypoints.description: Validate the structure of a workflow YAML file before execution.

parameters.name: workflow.yaml
parameters.description: Path to the workflow YAML file.
